=
don't want to require JDK8.

Have you looked at Truth?

ote:

      <p>I would li=
ke to contribute to JUnit, and I think I have a good idea for a feature. I=
=E2=80=99ve found that it would be nice to have assertions that explicitly =
supported Java 8=E2=80=99s Optional class. I=E2=80=99m thinking something a=
long the lines of assertEmpty() and assertPresent(). Would such an addition=
 be welcomed?<br>
<br>
Thanks,<br>
Mark<br>
</p>
